page.title: 04Employment in Kingswood area
page.content: There is very little employment to be found in Kingswood and its surrounding area as there is no real {industry}here. Perhaps the main form of employment is{farming.}Apart from a few shops there is little else in the area except a publishing works which employs about 215 people. Kingswood is very much a{commuter area. The area can be described as a middle to upper class area and the sort of jobs people do vary somewhat. On the Kingswood estate there are many {retired}people and those who work are often in{finance}or are{self employed, often in the motor trade. In Lower Kingswood more likely{occupations}are such as policeman, teacher etc. Because of house prices,{unemployment is rare, especially in Kingswood itself.
